product_name: Black Diamond Modernist Rock Shirt - Men's
long_description: Combining a classic look with the benefits of Schoeller stretch-woven soft-shell fabric, the Black Diamond Modernist Rock Shirt blurs the line between the climbing life and the nightlife.
